website_summaries.verdict: The XV-21 is a great all-around robot vacuum and a viable Roomba alternative, but among Neatos, we'll stick with the brainier, similarly priced XV Signature Pro.
pros: With its specialty brushroll, the Neato XV-21 picks up pet hair better than any other robot vacuum we've tested
cons: Like all Neatos, the XV-21 isn't as feature rich as the average robot vacuum, lacking a remote control and customizable cleaning modes
It also isn't quite as smart a navigator as its newer siblings, the XV Signature Pro and the XV Essential

customer_reviews.title: It was great at first!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Neato in November of 2013 here on Amazon. I loved it for months! Unfortunately it's effectiveness began to decline rapidly after about a year. I tried replacing the batteries and giving the machine a thorough clean. Unfortunately those efforts only improved things briefly. And now it has been sitting unused on the floor for well over a year. I can't find any repair places locally that will look at it and its pretty heavy to try and ship anywhere. I feel like I've already put too much money into it. Not sure if I should just trash it and buy something else. And I'm unsure if the Neato brand is what I'll go with again.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: I have a bad feeling about this one too
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 and now that I've had them for over a year, I'm having trouble. The batteries have trouble charging. Neato's answer was to remove and reinstall the batteries. That worked in the beginning but now one is totally dead and out of warranty. To fix it, I have to spend $32 to have Neato's rep (a different company) examine it. I had to send it via UPS ($48). No answer yet. Now the second unit is asking me to constantly reset the battery charge period. I have a bad feeling about this one too. But hey, when they work, it's great.
customer_reviews.author: GHoover

customer_reviews.title: Worst purchase ever
customer_reviews.text: This was the worst value for money in all the products I have bought at Amazon. First, it gets stuck at every possible place, so your floors need to be completely free of all obstacles. Second, the battery dies really fast and can't even clean a one bedroom apartment. Third, the quality of cleaning is not at par, so you eventually have to clean again. I have had this for a while, and didn't use it for some time, now the battery is completely dead, and there is no way to get it fixed without spending a gazillion dollars again. No thank you sir. This Neato is going to garbage now.
customer_reviews.author: Paras

customer_reviews.title: Had 1 and went bad, so I got #2 found out #1 was ...
customer_reviews.text: Had 1 and went bad , so I got #2 found out #1 was under warranty, sent it in and got a replacement. So now I got two of them running around. Thank you NEATO you are the kind of company that gets repeat customers and keeps them. You got me and my mouth for life, I tell everyone I have a NEATO I have 3 dogs and a cat and when I walk in my socks no dog hair on my socks. Works great. THANKS AGAIN NEATO
customer_reviews.author: R.B

customer_reviews.title: I could have had two of these really cool XV's! We love the Neato
customer_reviews.text: Bought this just after the higher end Roomba. For the money I paid on the Roomba that randomly roams around my house getting lost and stuck bashing into everything, I could have had two of these really cool XV's! We love the Neato, it leaves a perfectly vacuumed room pattern every time, it has sensors that keep it from randomly "bashing" into everything unlike the Roomba. Also the Neato needs the bin emptied daily, Roomba, once every couple weeks. If you want a "real" floor cleaner, buy this not the Roomba. You'll be glad you did.
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: Cool vacuum ... until his warranty expired.
customer_reviews.text: Neato was great...for the first year. Vacuumed beautifully. He was fun to watch! Did an amazing job. But on the 13th month, he became disoriented & confused, kept cleaning the same spot over & over. So I contacted Neato Customer Service. Since he was out of warranty (by 1 month--isn't that usually the case?), I could ship him back to the company (for $79 to get a repair estimate, + $50 UPS shipping,) which I did. The repair people said his laser guidance system wasn't working properly, and that's the part that frequently malfunctions...and that he was unrepairable. Sorry! Wow! Never again Neato. I learned my lesson. Neato was great...while he lasted.
customer_reviews.author: C Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Not so neato Neato
customer_reviews.text: I loved this product when it worked. But after only 3 weeks it began to go in circles with an error code that read"left wheel stuck". When I looked up troubleshooting online I was amazed how many others have had the same issue. I decided I did not want to deal with an ongoing issue-I was afraid to void my warranty by messing with it. I decided to return it, which is easy and free with Amazon prime. I then purchased another vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Strand

customer_reviews.title: Nice little machine.
customer_reviews.text: So far I've used it about 3-4 times (since it is a supplement cleaner) and I'm still getting used to it's function. For instance, I am certain it has a mind of its own as it seems to like going in wide circles when I'd rather it go straight across. I will call the 'help' line as I'm sure there is a solution to this. It picks up everything in its path and easily goes from carpet to wood floor with no problem. It is funny to watch it return to home base and wiggle its 'butt' securely into position. I am satisfied with this robotic vacuum and like the fact that Neato vacuums are highly rated.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy A. Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Excellent price for performance
customer_reviews.text: I heard great things about the Neato and Roomba before purchasing. The XV-21 is a great compromise between cost and performance. Works great and has been reliable for the year I've had it so far. I did run into some initial issues with it getting stuck but they were due to obstructions, such as the fabric underneath the couch hanging too low and covering the laser (fixed by raising up/tightening up the fabric). When obstructions are clear, it works perfectly. When obstructions are present, it works about 60% of the time. Just make sure obstructions are clear and you will be fine. Great product. (Also, leave unplugged when not using it to extend the life of the nickel-metal hydride battery.)
customer_reviews.author: Samuel

customer_reviews.title: I hope to never be without a Neato again! Love it.
customer_reviews.text: What can I say? I love it. Little Neato has made my life so much easier. The squared off design lets Neato get in places our Rhomba could only dream about. The ability to program when it cleans on any given day is a great feature. You must keep the sensors clean or the poor little fella will bonk himself against everything. It takes 2 charges to clean 1200 sq ft. but Neato takes care of that. I highly recommend this, especially is you have pets (one large dog and 1cat), inside like I do. It's excellent at picking up hair.
customer_reviews.author: lynn williams

customer_reviews.title: I hardly have to vacuum anymore
customer_reviews.text: My nephew named our vacuum Larry. Larry does an overall good job in terms of floor coverage and cleaning power. Actually, he vacuums with the skill of a toddler (e.g. hitting the same area over and over...there's nothing there anymore Larry!). And like a toddler, Larry is susceptible to swallowing and choking on things that I work around when I'm vacuuming (e.g. phone charger cables). Unlike a toddler (and me), Larry is very thorough (I guess the silver lining to redundancy). Almost a year in, he's able to work for at least 20 minutes at a time before needing a recharge. This typically is good enough to do our large living room and kitchen area.
customer_reviews.author: as

customer_reviews.title: I love my neato!
customer_reviews.text: This thing saves me from vacuuming my hard wood floors every day because I have a high-shedding dog. I pre-set it to run every day and it does a great job. Changing the filter is easy, cleaning it is easy. It has gotten stuck a few times but it is really not often considering that I run it every day. Also it has gotten confused before and said something was blocking its path when there was nothing there. This has only happened a few times but I found that putting it back on its base and then back to where it was kind of "resets" it. Love this little guy!
customer_reviews.author: B Renee

customer_reviews.title: Neato, please clean up your act!
customer_reviews.text: Battery went dead in 10 minutes. Wouldn't perform scheduled cleanings. Neato Support associate said the company would not refund my money without putting me through a series of troubleshooting steps (and possible unit replacement), although the battery problem is apparently a known issue. The prescribed troubleshooting involved battery recalibration. In my opinion, recalibration on a brand new unit means something's not right to begin with. Sorry, Neato Robotics, I'm looking for "plug and play". Neato, please clean up your act. The one star is for "cute". Otherwise, this unit gets no stars from me.
customer_reviews.author: Tood

customer_reviews.title: Worked for only 1 year
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for about a year. Replaced batteries, filters etc to maintain. Now the dirt bin does not stay closed or register as being closed so it doesn't work anymore. Also the new battery didn't last as long. Used to do all 3 rooms before charging, now it does 1 (when it was actually working). It picks up a lot of dog hair and dirt but wears on the sides of any rugs so beware if you have rugs. Over time the edges look "fuzzy" from damage from the brushes. I would try a different brand. Reviews overall seem to point to a short life for neato vacuums.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Good machine, good support
customer_reviews.text: I sure love these things, I have 1 for upstairs, 1 for downstairs, and 1 for my office. The first one I bought has been working for 3 years now on 2 sets of batteries (have a German Shepard who constantly sheds) so I run the upstairs every other day. The downstairs runs every other day as well, and it broke at 1 year and 10 days (laser stopped spinning). I contacted Neato, and they sent a replacement even though it was out of warranty; just had to pay shipping. The office one has been cleaning flawlessly for about a year now (other than occasionally getting stuck when someone leaves a cord or something on the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Reety

customer_reviews.title: Best vacuum ever
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my parents. They had a different type and hated it. This one they just love. My mom had commented on it several times. It is much easier for them than lugging out a big vacuum . They program it to what day and time they want the floors swept. All they have to worry about is emptying the dust bin. .
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: I dont get in trouble for playing with the maid
customer_reviews.text: Ive had it for a week now and its doing a great job!. We even named it. It took it a couple of days to learn the house as it kept getting tangled or trapped. But the last two days I've come home and its back on its charging station, I guess it now knows where not to go. The magnetic strips have became handy specially around the Xmas tree. Having two large dogs our house was always full of dirt and hair, but no more. I cant believe the amount of dirt that my house accumulates from one day to the other. Now if there was a robot that will dust my furniture!
customer_reviews.author: luis

customer_reviews.title: Neato replacement policy
customer_reviews.text: My previous review was very positive. The neato was great. But within 6 months it failed. Not once but several times. We contacted neato and each time we were able to get it working by disconnecting batteries and rebooting the system. But it finally failed and had to be replaced and this is where I hit a snag. The company would replace the unit but I had to pay the postage, about $25. Not having any good choice, I did and now I have a replacement unit, I think reconditioned. But with me having to pay the shipping and handling cost for a failed unit, I cannot recommend it or for that matter any other Neato product
customer_reviews.author: mcashee

customer_reviews.title: Very inefficient - don't buy
customer_reviews.text: It cleans, but 1) it goes over the same areas 5-10 times and the dust bin is so small you can't just leave and let it do the job. You have to empty the bin every 10-15 minutes and it takes approx an hour and a half to vacuum 1000sf - it would take 30 minutes with a broom. Also it's noisy, so it's not like you wanna supervise it while it works. I'd return if I could, just doesn't really serve it's purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Halbleib

customer_reviews.title: Or something like that. It was trying to start again
customer_reviews.text: Used for 1 month and it started saying something about "cannot see pathway", please push button. Or something like that. It was trying to start again, then stop. I had this unit for 30 days when this error started to occur. I called Amazon and they issued me a refund thank goodness. I have owned 3 Neato's, the first model worked well for years. But this XV-21, is a bad.
customer_reviews.author: anyhandleleft

customer_reviews.title: not happy with neato robot
customer_reviews.text: The robot worked ok for several months, but developed vision problems. Also it take around 4 hours to clean 1900 sq ft home. We cleaned the entire machine using the tutorials provided online and while on the phone under directions of neato support. No luck with vision. If fact it got worse. Encountered error #4000 5 time in 20 minutes. We asked for replacement and provided all required documentation. That was 3 days ago and they have not given an estimated time of arrival for new robot. They also have not responded to my email request for ETA. We give it 1 star due to customer service, otherwise it would be 2 stars.
customer_reviews.author: B.Eppler

customer_reviews.title: An amazing and very helpful little machine!
customer_reviews.text: An amazing little machine! The Neato XV-21 vacuum cleaner is a fantastic innovation, and has been a real aid to assisting our routine housecleaning efforts. This rugged little machine is very thorough, and it's ability to clean thoroughly is nothing short of incredible. The only minor criticism I would have is that the battery charge cycle is somewhat limited. However, the re-charge time is also relatively short, so the Neato is pretty quickly back on the job, picking up exactly where it left off. It has been very helpful and I would buy it again, in a second!
customer_reviews.author: BC

customer_reviews.title: The Sad World of Neato Quality Control
customer_reviews.text: The first XV-21 I received would only run about 25 minutes, even after a battery replacement. Since I was still within the amazon return/replacement time limit, I returned it to amazon for a "new" unit. The replacement unit wouldn't charge at all, even after putting in working batteries. As the outer Neato box was unsealed, I expect I wasn't the first person to receive this broken unit. Go ahead and buy a Neato. You may get one of my returned units.
customer_reviews.author: D. Com

customer_reviews.title: Well so far I m really disappointed. I am seriously thinking of returning this and ...
customer_reviews.text: Well so far I m really disappointed. I am seriously thinking of returning this and more than likely will. It is stupid. It takes 8 hours to vac our house, shy? because it waste so much battery going around and around and back and forth in a hall way for instance doing the same area 3 or 4 x it looks like it gets confused This was supposed to be more sufficient than the rumba's weird way. But I don't see it. It is just easier and much quicker the get the vacuum out. So I say forget this technology. We have a LONG WAY until we have to worry about any "terminators"
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Weaver

customer_reviews.title: SO OVER IT
customer_reviews.text: I am so aggitated that i spent this amount of money for a vacuum that i really did love when it works. But two machines later, i am over it. First machine had a criticle error after about 5 months and Amazon replaced it. Now the second one has done the same thing after about 3 months. SO OVER IT
customer_reviews.author: Gamer's Wife

customer_reviews.title: A Life saving equipment for working couples & people with dust allergy. A must buy.
customer_reviews.text: This is a life saver. Brilliant cleaning robot on carpets. Superb quality of cleaning, not only vacuums but the roller brush picks up last piece of hair from carpet. Doesn't hit walls hard, doesn't move around randomly. Vacuums the perimeter and then alternating sweeps within the perimeter. Super easy to clean the dust box & HEPA filter. Only one thing to keep in mind, you need a very light weight & handy manual vacuum cleaner at home to clean the borders. Because, Neato can't clean 2 inches from the wall/obstackle. Which is totally acceptable & logical.
customer_reviews.author: Suman

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Have had this about 3 weeks and I have to say it works pretty well for helping me keep up with 3 dogs that she'd like crazy. It doesn't replace my regular vacuum for deep cleaning and getting places that this one can't reach. I did take off one star because it doesn't go through the whole house. I have about 2800sf and it tends to stay in just one open area. Over all it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Nice for maintenance, but can't be your only vacuum.
customer_reviews.text: Been using this for a couple of weeks. Does a pretty good job. It will not replace your normal vacuuming if your house is more than about 1200 square feet. It does a decent job in the corners, but again, will not completely replace a manual vacuuming. It will go up on Berber style rugs nice and under furniture, so that is great. However, it gets stuck try to go up on our shag/plush rug. Great for mid week maintenance to keep the pet hair under control. It comes with magnetic strips to put in front of door jams for a boundary. I had to purchase addition magnetic strips, which are a little pricey, but useful.
customer_reviews.author: Sothurnboy

customer_reviews.title: Great product -- I have my weekend back! However, YMMW.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the Neato-XV 21, but after two months, it turned out to have a defective Lidar sensor. The company promptly shipped me a Signature Pro instead; I was going to write a glowing review on the Neato XV-21 but now with the Signature Pro, I posted a more thorough on its product page. Excellent customer service, and both vacuums work very well. However, as I note in the Signature Pro review, is (except for the housing color), quite the same, and probably not worth the extra $100 in price. All you get is an extra filter in the box. So far, they both pick up the same amount of dirt.
customer_reviews.author: PRH

customer_reviews.title: Coming home to clean floors never felt so good
customer_reviews.text: We've had our neato for about 6 months now and I love it 85%. We are on our second neato as our first would not clear our error message. However the customer service was great and we received a replace without mixing hassale. Neato needs to be emptied often in our house of 3 dogs, but has significantly cut down my vacuuming time; nearly by 75%. You do have to take out the brush often to clean but is easy enough to do. For the price, definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren M.

customer_reviews.title: Zero Stars
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this unit in 2014. it worked Greta for 6 ,months and then stopped working. I contacted Neato and they sent a replacement ( refurbished unit). this unit worked about 8 months and now has stopped working, I called customer support and they have put in the run around for 3 weeks, saying that they cant replace the machine, I explained that neither unit has worked and I expect them to stand behind their products. My recommendation to any potential buyer is to NOT BUY this unit and find one that works and is supported by their manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: J Stone

customer_reviews.title: stop returning to base
customer_reviews.text: It worked well the first few times but then it kept getting lost and not returning to base and dying in the middle of a cleaning. My dog was also scared of this vacuum but he is a chicken away. Considering the price, my husband decided to return it. It cleans a tile floor and area rugs fairly well but misses the corners a lot. I would not buy this if you have a cluttered room because it is going to constantly be trying to go around things and the battery will die quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Patchy

customer_reviews.title: Love this little machine
customer_reviews.text: I love this little machine! She really does a good job. We recently replaced our carpet with wood-look vinyl so the dust and fur are very apparent. We have two indoor cats including a Main Coon cat. She sheds a LOT! We run Neato nearly ever day. I only get out the big vac about every other week to get into the hard to reach areas. Neato keeps the cat fur and dust to a minimum. She is so short she can get all the way under sofas and beds. I love to watch her work - and try to keep things out of her way.
customer_reviews.author: Christie Pollard

customer_reviews.title: I usually dont leave reviews but this machine has been ...
customer_reviews.text: I usually dont leave reviews but this machine has been a nightmare for me! Within a year of purchase it breaksdown, after numerous emails back and forth with the customer service, I received a replacement refurbished machine which was not even working. It keeps turning off within 5 minutes of the use. I complained again but customer service didn't do anything other than providing me information on their repair service, funai. After sending in the machine for repair, after spending another $150 I finally received the machine after 4-5 months with a battery problem. Machine wont even turn on now!!! arggggghhhhh
customer_reviews.author: Lena

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY EVER!!!
customer_reviews.text: If I could rate this a 0 star---I would! this product worked for about 3 months. Since then, we've called the company many times to try and get help. They would lose our previous history and start over every time. During the warranty period, they gave us the same 'fixes' that NEVER worked. Our neato got worse and worse. Finally, once the warranty period ran out...they told us "sorry, you'll have to take it to a repair shop and pay". TERRIBLE SERVICE, TERRIBLE PRODUCT! Do NOT waste your money. this was the WORST item we've ever purchased from amazon. Amazon was no help either.
customer_reviews.author: afmom

customer_reviews.title: Best machine out there!
customer_reviews.text: The Neato XV-21 is fantastic! The laser guidance system is by far the best and it seems to learn as it goes, rather then bounce around and miss sections like the roomba and I have had 3 different roomba models and they do not even come close to the technology that is built into the Neato. The suction is twice what the roomba has. If you have a large home and schedule it to run at a certain time, it will start the cleaning and if it battery runs low it will go back to the dock, recharge itself and return to where it left off and finish the cleaning cycle. If I could give it 10 stars I would
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: This is TERRIBLE!! I pay this money for NOTHING!
customer_reviews.text: DON'T buy this!!This machine couldn't be charge AT ALL and been used before!!And I can never use it since it was out of power at the first place.The most terrible thing is that I can't even return this because I'm a foreign buyer.The staff just keep saying that this machine was completely new when shipped.OK,how do you even know that?
customer_reviews.author: jyuuiti

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Item
customer_reviews.text: I waited a while before reviewing this item, and now that it has been working so well for a number of months, it is time. Pro's - Remembers where his charging station is and returns to it a couple of times when cleaning the whole house. I have it setup to clean every day, and cannot believe that it finds so much dust and dirt. Cons- A few times it has gotten stuck under a bed or under a chair. Overall, I highly recommend this item. I have a long haired cat, and this keeps the house clean.
customer_reviews.author: barbara graen

customer_reviews.title: Battery only lasts 10 minutes
customer_reviews.text: It works great, aside from the fact that it fully depletes its battery after about 10 minutes. Its settings require that it the floor in 3 cycles or less, so 30 minutes of total clean time. Which is totally unrealistic. I've tried working with Neato customer service to resolve the issue, but no luck. It's a downright lie that they say the battery capacity is 45 minutes. Totally impractical and can't function. Vacuuming with a normal vacuum is much less of a headache than using this thing.
customer_reviews.author: R.M. Wells

customer_reviews.title: Great when it doesn't get stuck.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because my parents got one and loved it. I have two dogs and I schedule this to run everyday to keep down the dander and hair. This is actually worse than manual vacuuming because I have to monitor it when it cleans downstairs. It seems to get stuck in one spot, says "please clear my path," and nothing is there. It's hitting an outward wall corner. It will get stuck every time and has yet to complete the downstairs without help. However, I do like it because when cleaning the bedrooms, it gets under the beds and dressers.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Muise

customer_reviews.title: NO GOOD!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This bot is poorly engineered and poorly backed by Neato. When it failed the first time they wanted ME to run a battery charge and discharge routine, after I did that it failed again. I was sent a replacement that is now sitting in a corner and can't figure out how to get out. DO NOT BUY THIS IT IS UNRELIABLE. I am sorry I ever bought this piece of crap. I called Neato to see if they would do anything as far as returning it for credit or refund, after I was ignored for several days I was told that they would not do anything.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy J

customer_reviews.title: Best robot cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I give this product a five becaus it is the best product on the market for robotic cleaners. I have had Roombas and they do not compare to neato. The roomba leaves marks on you baseboards and if you have a grate on the floor it will vibrate the rear compartment loose. This does not happen with the neato. The neato does a good job mapping the room which is another feature roomba is lacking. The filtration is good I make sure I clean it every time I use a paint brush to clean it works great. I totally recommend this product I have three now.
customer_reviews.author: Parks61

customer_reviews.title: Good things in small packages
customer_reviews.text: I'd ordered from a private party at a much lower price than offered elsewhere. Never got the product, and the party withdrew from Amazon's private party offering. Got my money back, and ordered another model of the Neato vac. Paid more of course, but I love it. It's very thorough, and recharges itself.
customer_reviews.author: Shari Schreiber, M.A.

customer_reviews.title: Better then Roomba
customer_reviews.text: hate to say it, but yes much better then roomba =/ I still love my roomba but this thing flat out, out performs it. Never gets lost going home. No more of that annoying, bang bang, optics work great finding objects, even my lazy dog when he wants to just lay in front of it, the neato will change course and go around him. Really low carpet it doesn't do the best getting hair up, but flat floors, and med carpet seems to do best on.
customer_reviews.author: Rusty

customer_reviews.title: Neato vs 2 Siberian Huskies...  Neato wins!
customer_reviews.text: WOW! That's Neato in one word! We have 2 Siberian Huskies who shed like crazy. We programmed Neato to run every day at 10:30am and it does every room on the main level, crawling over saddles, getting in corners, and even under narrow furniture. We ended up buying a second one for the bedroom level and set it up last night. These vacuums cut down on our cleaning time so much with their daily vacuuming. I wouldn't buy any other machine!
customer_reviews.author: Just a couple of bears

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum does a great job picking up every spec of dirt on my wood and tile floors. It even does a good job on our area rug. The only thing keeping me from giving 5 stars is that it's mapping seems to be a little off and it can get lost or go over the same spot several times; but at this price compared to the Roomba and other pricier brands I can deal with it. Definitely go for it if you have pets you are constantly vacuuming up after!
customer_reviews.author: Candice

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Even better customer service!
customer_reviews.text: We named her "Rosa" and we love her. As long as your house is tidy from the start she will keep the dog hair and dirt off the floors! After a few months she started getting stuck more often so I called the company and they politely taught me how to keep the sensors clean, but that didn't fix the issue so they sent be a brand new one! "Rosa 2" seems to be doing great!
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Harlon Burnside

customer_reviews.title: Much better than Roomba
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great, it has a laser that spins and maps out the room, and vacuums exactly where it needs to unlike the roomba that just bounces off walls and whatnot. It's also easier to clean than the Roomba. I'm giving it 4 stars only because I've bought this one as a replacement for the same model where the laser stopped spinning and thus the machine stopped working. I'm taking a chance buying a like new without the warranty for the lower price. I will say though, these are well worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Olexa

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it until battery issues are overcome
customer_reviews.text: I tried two of these units and both were fraught with battery issues. The first one I worked with Neato customer service on and did not get any improvement in run times (only got 10 minutes each run), so I returned it to Amazon. The 2nd one had the same problem, so Neato sent me a new set of batteries. It worked like a champ for 2 days, then every time I ran it I got the "Battery Issue 0002" error and the machine would die completely. Back it goes. Such a shame, because the vacuum power and navigation are first rate.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Save your money, research your other options.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this thing for a while, didn't use it for almost a year. Now I've brought it back out, bought new batteries, new filters, new brushes, and it just doesn't work. As of the moment of this writing, the Neato is sitting in the middle of a wide-open living room stopped with a message asking me to clear its path. I've watched the video, it hasn't fixed anything. There are other great options out there for significantly less...DO NOT PURCHASE! I am throwing mine out as soon as I hit 'Submit.'
customer_reviews.author: Aiden

customer_reviews.title: Great Vacuum for Pet Hair
customer_reviews.text: Don't usually write reviews but I really love this vacuum. It is really good at picking up pet hair. I have two long hair cats and this vacuum does a great job of keeping my harwood floors neat. It is true that you will need to vacuum corners and around furniture where the Neato cannot go but that for me is not a problem and reduces the time I need to spend vacuuming the house. Do corners once every three weeks. I plan to purchase a second one soon as I have two stories and would like to just keep the Neato (Hazel) in one place and not have to move her up and downstairs.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Lamb

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Awesome vacuum. Doesn't quite get corners but what would you expect being it doesn't have an,extending arm or such. But it vacuums nicely. I have it set to vacuum 2x a week downstairs. It does tile and carpet fine. Just make sure chair legs and such are not imposing it. For it has a hard time moving around those objects if they aren't positioned just right. The magnetic border it comes with comes in handy to keep cords for lights and electronic devices out of the way. It jas a mind all its own but dies things in a somewhat strategized pattern while cleaning. Overall it's a great product and highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: michael c mimay

customer_reviews.title: This thing works good, the thing only does 1/2 of our 1800 ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing works good, the thing only does 1/2 of our 1800 sq ft home before reducing and charging and going a second time to finish. That is okay but the dirt trap needs emptied pretty much every time it needs charged. The eyes need cleaned at least once a week or it gets lost, its not hard just a small pain. The vacuum is very loud so no problem with my dogs messing with it.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: These vacuums (Neato) are the best and "smartest" out
customer_reviews.text: These vacuums (Neato) are the best and "smartest" out. I have a Rumba as well that cannot keep up with the Neato. The only downfall to them is once the batteries start to wear out the vacuum gets lost. Replace batteries and it is like new again.
customer_reviews.author: Ace

customer_reviews.title: Maid till it died..
customer_reviews.text: Worked great... did a wonderful job keeping up with 2 people and 2 dogs, until it went into a pool of water from watered plant...i almost cried, looking to buy a replacement soon.
customer_reviews.author: Carl S

customer_reviews.title: I have it for a couple of years and it still sucks most dust and hair from my hardwood and carpet ...
customer_reviews.text: Powerfull vacuum, I have it for a couple of years and it still sucks most dust and hair from my hardwood and carpet floors. Usually it's able to navigate all first floor's rooms, but sometimes it gets stuck between chairs. My only complaint is about its battery: it degrates quickly and I had to replace it more times than I would like, since the replacements are so expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Tales R.

customer_reviews.title: it's been working fine. I can really tell the difference when it ...
customer_reviews.text: I've now had this for over a year, all I've had to do is clean it out regularly, it's been working fine. I can really tell the difference when it hasn't run. I work full time, have two children, and a few pets. This keeps me from having to sweep the floor several times a day. It takes care of dirt and sand from the outside, crumbs from the kids and pet hair. It is a little like a dog, it chases the cats and eats things it's not supposed to.
customer_reviews.author: Gwen Hagey-Shirk

customer_reviews.title: I love the way it cleans which is superior to the ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the way it cleans which is superior to the rumba however as other reviews have noted it is very glitchy. It gets confused about where it is, never makes it back to the docking, and usually never finishes a complete clean because it thinks there something in its path when there's nothing or its vision gets blocked. A lot. I'm about to send it into the manufacturer since Amazon return policy is has expired
customer_reviews.author: Dreamspinner

customer_reviews.title: Sucks
customer_reviews.text: We received this vacuum and it stopped constantly, often for no apparent reason, with the message, "Please put my dust bin back in." The problem has gotten worse over time and now it just sits there beeping incessantly, with the same message displayed. The dust bin seems to be in, but will not click in place at all, meaning the vacuum will not function. Once it starts a scheduled clean, it just sits there beeping regardless of how many times you put the dust bin back in.. If not for the dust bin problem, this would be a great item, but the problem has not only rendered it dysfunctional, but annoying with the constant beeping.
customer_reviews.author: KS

customer_reviews.title: We returned it to Costco (that is good part of buying from Costco)
customer_reviews.text: After we bought this only 3 months, it stopped working - it always gave the error message "My brush is stuck, please free it from debris." even the brush was clean. Now it has been sitting there for more than 2 months and collecting dust. Before we got this one, we bought a similar one from Costco, but after 2 months, it stopped working. We returned it to Costco (that is good part of buying from Costco). This one has passed one month return period. Over $300 for 3 months service just for family room - very expensive. We will not buy it anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Neato vacuum is superior among other brands
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Neato vacuum. We use one for the main floor and one for the basement. Neato vacuum is superior among other brands. It sucks a lot of dust and keeps the house clean. We usually just leave it run in the morning before going to work and when we come back home, it's done its job. Sometimes it may get stuck if it can't get a clear path. But this does not happen too often especially if you have a house with an open floor plan. Great robot vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: johnny_utah

customer_reviews.title: OUTSTANDING
customer_reviews.text: Works great. My first one work very good then I got error message left wheel stuck, got ahold of company and followed advise and still would not work. They stood by their product and sending me a new one. I have IRobot and IRobot Scooba and they work great too but they take longer to clean and runs in no set pattern, I like the Neato xv-21 more it takes less time to clean and does a better job.
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: it worked pretty good. It isn't the smartest thing
customer_reviews.text: Bought this exactly a year ago. For the first 5 months, it worked pretty good. It isn't the smartest thing, but it was good enough. I wish there was a way to turn off the beeping setting when it gets stuck. Oh well. The real problem was that after 6 months, it died. It never held a charge again regardless of what I did. It wouldn't even charge enough to turn on for 2 seconds while it was plugged in. So if you want this for more than 6 months, pass on it. You're better off getting a cleaner to come by for 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: James Kittridge

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Worth every penny!!
customer_reviews.text: Worth it! I absolutely love my Neato. This robot vacuum has a schedule you can set for daily cleaning and keeps out house dog hair free! It picks up dirt when you can't see or notice any dust or dander... the best invention ever!
customer_reviews.author: Health4a

customer_reviews.title: My Cleaning Fairy!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this cleaner!! It picks up so much pet hair and really gets in the corners. Because of the noise, I simply start it when I leave for work and let it do it's thing. It did get stuck under my dining room table every once in a while, so now I pick the chairs up and put them on the table every time, and have had no problem since. I have 2 Australian shepherds, an English mastiff, and a Great Pyrenees who come in & out as they please so dirt from the farm and dog hair is a daily thing. The Neato takes care of the mess on a daily basis.
customer_reviews.author: sharon

customer_reviews.title: It's been more than a year since we purchased our ...
customer_reviews.text: It's been more than a year since we purchased our Neato, and he's been diligently picking up after our cat and dog week after week, 3 times a week. We did have to replace the batteries not too long ago though, and he sorta seems to be bumping into more things nowadays (must be the old age), but he's still a life changer and we wouldn't replace him for anything (well.... perhaps another Neato).
customer_reviews.author: Milad Shamshiri

customer_reviews.title: all it did was bump into my lazy good for nothing dogs
customer_reviews.text: This did not vacuum up my allergies or my pets, all it did was bump into my lazy good for nothing dogs, eventually it went around them. I was expecting to come home to a dog free house, I walk in the door and guess what, they were still there. And the cat, dont even get me started, this thing is way to slow to even consider vacuuming up a cat. After about a year of use the battery is finally dead.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan A.

customer_reviews.title: Really good... not perfect
customer_reviews.text: It's a really good vacuum cleaner (probably one of the bests in the market): great suction and works quite well. Although its not perfect: - for some reason sometimes it stops for no reason in the middle of the room and show a message in the display that it is stucked; - doesn't clean the edges; - it cleans just well - but better than others; - each time it does a different route to clean the house, so I don't know it its algorithm is very good.
customer_reviews.author: Seidi J.

customer_reviews.title: After almost one year of ownership...
customer_reviews.text: At first, I thought this machine was great. It did well cleaning, and for the first 6 months, was operating with no issues. Then, randomly, the unit started acting differently. On tile floors, the dust bin would all of a sudden pop out. We called in for a replacement, and they sent a new dust bin, but that didn't resolve the issue. I'm going to contact them again to see what else we can do, but I'm starting to regret this purchase. Should have gone with a Roomba instead.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: but she is very happy. had it six days and ran it three ...
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my wife for Christmas. not very personal, but she is very happy. had it six days and ran it three times already, can't believe how well it learns the house layout. finding dust we never knew we had. oh, and it's "smarter" than we are, but easy to program and get started. really a great product. shipped fast, and packaged well.
customer_reviews.author: bookworm

customer_reviews.title: Buy Me - You Won't Regret It!
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful appliance. The amount of dust and pet hair it picks up is amazing. It needs a bit of babysitting when you first use it (seeing what obstacles it will clear or not), but once you get that down, it's a breeze to operate. We have carpeting throughout our 1600 sq ft home, except for two bathrooms & tiled kitchen/dining. At first it took several sessions to complete a cleaning because of the small dust bin (and three shedding pets!), but after its several overall vacuumings, it can pretty much do the house in two sessions. Best thing I've bought in a long time.
customer_reviews.author: ACS

customer_reviews.title: All pet and non pet owners need one of these.
customer_reviews.text: BEST thing ever invented. This thing is the best purchase of the year for us. Absolutely love it and have it running everyday. Cleans so well, make sure you remember to empty the collection bin often!
customer_reviews.author: Chatty McChat

customer_reviews.title: I think that is pretty unacceptable for something that worked for less than a ...
customer_reviews.text: I had this for a year before it stopped working. I called customer service and they said i would need a new battery which costs $50. I think that is pretty unacceptable for something that worked for less than a year and then clonked out.
customer_reviews.author: Sara C

customer_reviews.title: Life Changing
customer_reviews.text: We bought this vacuum for our daughter to help clean her house and help with the pet hair. She has been very pleased with this vacuum and feels that it has been a life changer.
customer_reviews.author: Lhighfield

customer_reviews.title: One year old and out of juice
customer_reviews.text: This has been a handy little vacuum which we've used almost exclusively on the hardwood floors in our bedroom approximately 3-4 times a week. It goes under the bed and into the corners vacuuming the amazing amounts of fur that our Golden Retriever leaves behind. Unfortunately, now that it's one year old, it cannot clean the entire room on one charge. Before it's finished, it needs to go back to base and recharge and finish later. Our bedroom is only 13 x 14! The recharge time isn't long, maybe 10 minutes, but this sounds like the beginning of the end to me. I'd hoped for better.
customer_reviews.author: S. Lacey

customer_reviews.title: Returned it
customer_reviews.text: Maybe I got a dumb one, but it just wasn't what I expected. I did my best to keep the floor clear of obstructions etc, but never could get the thing to do the house w/o getting stuck. I would come home from work, to find it stuck, half the wheels on the floor, half the wheels up on the wall (How that happend I haven't the slightest clue). I have concrete floors, I purchased it to help with pet hair problems, but I think i'll just stick to my Dyson vaccum. It might do better for someone else, but it's not right for me.
customer_reviews.author: KkdTx

customer_reviews.title: REALLY wanted to like this!
customer_reviews.text: Just a total disapointment.Batteries stayed charged all of 10 minutes and then it couldn't even make it back to charging station. Would also say need to be cleaned after 5 minutes on rug that had been vacumned. Too much work involved but returned immediately and got refund. MAJOR dissapointment as concept was wonderful. Have multiple sclerosis and not having to push around a vacumn was so enticing. Don't waste your $.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Cullers

customer_reviews.title: Works great once you learn what you should have out of ...
customer_reviews.text: Wish they had an upgrade program. I really wish I could have gotten the new version with the side brushes. Works great once you learn what you should have out of the way for it not to get stuck. I wish the batteries would last longer seems we get a 1 out of a set and have to replace them since they loose their capacity to hold much of a charge.
customer_reviews.author: Christo

customer_reviews.title: It is the best thing I ever bought.
customer_reviews.text: I have a Dog that always comes in on my hard wood floors with her paws full of grass or dirt. I just turn my Neato on and let it go. It amazes me how well it cleans the floors in my living room and kitchen. It is so much fun to sit and watch this little machine do a job. I have a couple of jute rugs under the tables and it has no trouble going under the tables and around the legs. When finished it returns to the dock.
customer_reviews.author: Shaun

customer_reviews.title: Great device!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing device. When I bought it I must admit I was a bit skeptical, even though I had read several good reviews about it in different websites. I have a Golden Retriever and my apartment has never been so clean!!! I programmed the vacum cleaner "Tina" to run once a day. Does a great work and goes though all the apartment (100m2).
customer_reviews.author: UT

customer_reviews.title: It Sucks But That is Good
customer_reviews.text: I have a Roomba too and this is superior in its power and intelligence. The only objection I have is all of the little magnetic strips we have laying around the house to try and block it from going where it is not supposed to go. Not only are these little strips a decorating nightmare, the vacuum cleaner often ignores the strips and goes around them. If you can put up with that, you'll love the way it vacuums.
customer_reviews.author: T.K.

customer_reviews.title: Love having my floors done every day!
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact that I don't have to vacuum every day. I love the fact that my carpets are relatively clean. It has some problems with corners and it seems to get lost fairly often. However, there's a software update that should correct some of that, I just haven't downloaded it yet. But having a pet, I run it every day and it has plenty of dog hair in it every day. I'm very happy that I purchased this product.
customer_reviews.author: SP

customer_reviews.title: definitely consider this before more expensive brands
customer_reviews.text: Neato has exceeded our expectations. We mistankly got a returned unit at first but within 3 days, we had the brand new unit at our door and its been great ever since. We dont understand its path or nor choose too. It gets stuck on the floor heat register and we figured out that it fell down the stairs because the sensors were dirty. Our house is very dusty as windows are open year round. The fall didnt hurt the unit but obviously we didnt want it happening again. I got this unit for $250-275 and Im more than pleased. The floors are spotless. I still dont know why people pay 3x as much for a competitor. Neato works great!
customer_reviews.author: K Burgsnyder

customer_reviews.title: Once it "learned" the area to clean it works great but you must be patient with it
customer_reviews.text: Be patient with it..it needs time to "learn" the rooms. We bought it for our son and daughter-in-law to try out because they have 2 cats and a 2 year old. Once it "learned" the area to clean it works great but you must be patient with it. We have bought another one for our other son and plan on buying 2 more. It is well worth the money. Also be sure to buy filters. :)
customer_reviews.author: dkb

customer_reviews.title: Works Great until it doesn't.
customer_reviews.text: I bought mine in June of 2012. It worked fine, aside from the occasional getting lost and having to carried back to the docking station. Last week I noticed that it was not running. I look at the screen and it said that it was cleaning house. (which means it thought it was working) the menu button is no completely unresponsive and I have a paperweight. I am not willing to shell out almost $400 every year to replace it. I 'll do it my self. Neato was ... less than helpful. Pay $200 for a refurbished one or get a new one... no thanks
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Great...when it was actually cleaning.
customer_reviews.text: Bought one of these as a Christmas gift and was very disappointed. Battery would only last about 20 mins before it needed to go back to the charging base. Took over 3 hours for it to finish cleaning a 1 bedroom apartment. Would have to recharge 4 times during the process. When it actually cleaned, it did a pretty good job of picking up dirt and pet hair (only reason for a 2nd star), but just couldn't justify having it recharge every 20 mins. Sent it back to Amazon for refund.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin L.

customer_reviews.title: Works great, when it works......
customer_reviews.text: Works great on pet hair! However, having issues with the bin "popping" out all the time....so I have to scotch tape it down. Also, it gets stuck under my couch everytime. (1) 5ft magnetic strip (provided) will "detour" it, but then goes around other side of couch and gets stuck, anyway. Needs constant babysitting with all the issues, but you can relax and watch it work. Debating on whether we should return.......it would be easier to just do it myself at this point, & would be quicker and less of a headache instead of a inconvienence.
customer_reviews.author: Zack C.

customer_reviews.title: Would love it if I did not continue having battery issues!
customer_reviews.text: I only give this item 3 stars because I continue to have issues with the battery. It worked for a week or so; I used daily. My Neato would go back to recharge of 4-6 minutes of use. I followed all instructions as to how and reset the battery, but no luck. Now, when I try to charge the machine I continue to get an error code of 0002 or 0004 stating battery issue. I'm ready to send the item back.
customer_reviews.author: Melika03

customer_reviews.title: The best Vac ever
customer_reviews.text: For all Amazon shopper this is the best Vacuum in the market. I have this Vacuum program 24/7 and it keep my rug clean I have not use my regular vacuum cleaner since. I highly recommend this for people on the go and just do not have time to vacuum, it is great to come home to clean rugs and floors. Bottom line the money is well spend.
customer_reviews.author: Cesar J. Vado

customer_reviews.title: TOTAL RIPOFF
customer_reviews.text: What a piece of CRAP!!! Works fine up until the warranty runs out, and then "Neato" tells you you have to pay $38 to have it evaluated to see if it can be repaired. DONT BUY ANYTHING FROM THIS COMPANY --- TOTAL RIPOFF --- customer service completely inflexible and says "We apologize for you inconvenience" ... whatever, while they keep your money and hide behind the 1-year warranty. Total waste of $300.00
customer_reviews.author: Joe P.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I can not brag about this product enough. My whole downstairs is tile or hard wood flooring and it saves me a ton. At first it got confused a couple of times. Just needed to learn the floor plan. Now it goes back to its station every time. Love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: we love our robbies
customer_reviews.text: bought two of these, we have 3 cats and 1 dog other than it getting confused about where its base is as every once and a while, we love our robbies
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: works great. bought my daughter one
customer_reviews.text: works great. bought my daughter one. picks up dog hair effectively. amazed how much is in container. sometimes the battery doesn't last as long??
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Sebastiano

customer_reviews.title: She loves it
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my wife and she looooves it. We've named it Veronica and we believe she is becoming self aware. I am amazed at how much stuff she is picking up from our carpets. I have an old Dyson and this thing is seriously kicking its butt in the cleaning dept. Plus, she does this all while I'm at work. This is my first robot vacuum and I'm hooked. If you have indoor pets get one of these.
customer_reviews.author: acim

customer_reviews.title: Two have died
customer_reviews.text: Ive been through two of these. They die within 6 months of the warranty running out. Major battery issues and malfunctioning. Customer service gives you a list of repair shops that you have to spend a lot of money to get repaired.
customer_reviews.author: patrick

customer_reviews.title: but it works pretty well. It does a great job of transitioning ...
customer_reviews.text: It's not quite the miracle cleaner I was hoping for, but it works pretty well. It does a great job of transitioning from wood to carpet and area rugs. Doesn't quite get everything along the edges. I almost always have to clean out the brush mid-vacuum because it gets bound up with dog hair. This is a little disappointing from a vacuum that is designed specifically for pet households. I only have one dog, so not an inordinate amount of hair. Still, it does a decent job, and saves me a lot of time!
customer_reviews.author: Elvis

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing! With the bad back I have it's a God send.
customer_reviews.text: Vacs great even with 4 cats. A little loud, but no more than a regular vacuum. I only have to watch it in one room of my house, the one with too much stuff in it. To improve it - I think it should have a pre filter so that doesn't plug up the main filter so easily. There is one thing I am worried about and that is it won't last long, so only time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Twinmtn

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I've had many of these 7 or 8 now since they came out. You do need to prep your home for their use, keep them maintained and they have been know for problems. For the price and what they do I'll keep buying them. They do a great job going places you don't vacuum, keeping the dust down in the house.
customer_reviews.author: Beemer

customer_reviews.title: Bad display
customer_reviews.text: Works decent but in less than a year the display stops working so you can no longer program it but it still works if you press the button. Disappointed the quality isn't better.
customer_reviews.author: P

customer_reviews.title: It died... BUT customer service came thru!
customer_reviews.text: I gave this only a 3 star because it died after 2 weeks,,BUT Neato sent me their top model as replacement the Signature Pro. Great customer service. I love it! I had to be without a robitic vacum for about 5 days - I really missed my vacum. They do a great job! I am hooked! I thought my floors were clean before, the robotic vacum showed me different. Amazing the dust it picks up.
customer_reviews.author: KVB

product_meta.title: Neato XV-21 Pet & Allergy Automatic Vacuum Cleaner
product_meta.description:
AMAZON.COM







NEATO XV-21 PET & ALLERGY AUTOMATIC VACUUM CLEANER
Designed especially for pet owners and allergy sufferers! 

The Neato XV-21 takes automatic vacuuming to a brand new level. Whether your floors are carpet, wood, tile, or vinyl, the XV-21 is ready to take on the task of keeping your floors neat and clean. 

The XV-21 features a special bristled brush that enables the pick-up of tough pet hair, dander and fibers, and the Pet and Allergy Filter boosts airflow and suction power and picks up and retains more than three times the amount of fine dust particles of standard filters. 

Come home to that “just cleaned” look: Easy to set up for daily cleaning – scans the room and automatically vacuums for you in an efficient back and forth pattern. Set it up to clean as often as you wish – even daily! 

Keep your home healthy, Reduces allergens and picks up pet hair. Unique Pet and Allergy Brush: Bristle Brush easily picks up pet hair; Runs quietly, especially on hard floors. Special Pet and Allergy Filter: Super-high airflow and suction power; Picks up and retains fine dust particles. Cleans Like You Do: Vacuums in methodical back-and-forth pattern; Vacuums close to walls and corners; Carefully cleans around obstacles and under furniture. Easy, Automatic Operation: Large, bagless dirt bin, it’s easy to empty and clean; Automatically adjusts between carpets and hard floors; Automatically returns to base to recharge. 

Bringing Next Generation Intelligence to Robotic Vacuum Cleaners: RPS Technology™, Laser-based Vision & Room Mapping: The Neato XV-21 is equipped with onboard Room Positioning System (RPS) technology, a revolutionary system developed by Neato Robotics that combines laser vision with mapping. 

With RPS technology, the robot uses its laser to see its surroundings and create accurate maps of areas to be cleaned – including furniture, objects and doorways. The robot constantly updates its map of the room, so if a new object is added into the room during a cleaning run, the robot will add it to the map. 








FIRST TIME USE
Place your robot vacuum on the charge base for its initial charge. Neato is ready to clean when the status light turns solid green. Charge the batteries overnight before you use your Neato XV-21 for the first time. After that, run through three complete cycles of charging and cleaning-until-recharge to get the most capacity from your batteries. 

HOW DO I GET THE MOST FROM MY NEATO XV-21 BATTERY?
You can recalibrate your Neato robot’s batteries to improve capacity and lengthen runtime between charges. You may need to recalibrate the batteries in these situations: 

 * The robot is new 
 *  The batteries are new 
 *  You updated the software 
 *  Your cleaning area expanded 
 * 
 * 
 * Follow the steps below to recalibrate the battery:
 * 
 * 
 * 1. Turn off any scheduled cleaning and confirm the robot's ON/OFF switch is ON.
 * 2. Reset the batteries by going to MENU->SUPPORT->NEW BATTERIES. 
 * 3. Place the Neato robot on its charge base over night to ensure a full charge. 
 * 4. Run the robot until it finishes cleaning the maximum area you ever want it to clean (i.e. the entire house), or until the robot displays “Battery Low” on its display and needs to recharge. 
 * 5. Dock the robot on its charge base for a full charge, until the status light turns solid green.
 * 6. Run the robot as usual until it needs to recharge again.
 * 7. If the runtime improves to longer than 40 minutes, the batteries have been recalibrated. If the run-time is still less than 40 minutes, go through the recharging cycle again. 



FROM THE MANUFACTURER
 

Trouble Shooting Steps:

Experiencing short runtime or batteries don’t hold charge
If you are experiencing shorter than expected run times please follow these troubleshooting steps:

1. Clean your robot thoroughly to ensure proper mechanical and sensor operation. Excessive debris build up, dirt, or dust can affect the robot’s ability to operate normally and can result in short run times.

Clean Brush
Clean/Replace Filters
Clean Wheels
Clean Sensors

2. Tryrecalibrating your robot’s batteries.
feature_bullets: Neato XV-21 Pet and allergy automatic vacuum, charging base, boundary marker
Features: Powerful cleaning system specially designed for pet owners and allergy sufferers
High performance vacuum removes all kinds of dirt and cleans all floors: carpets, rugs, hardwood, laminates, tile, and stone
Clean the charging contacts on the back of the robot as well as on the front of the charging base with a soft cloth
Automatically returns to charging base when vacuuming is concluded, kindly refer the video and the user manual given below for troubleshooting steps
